titles.title: WEST Act of 2024
WEST Act of 2024
Woke Endowment Security Tax Act of 2024
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to apply a 6 percent excise tax on large endowments of certain private colleges and universities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Woke Endowment Security Tax Act of 2024 or the WEST Act of 2024
This bill imposes a 6% excise tax on certain private educational institutions with endowments of at least $12.2 billion and institutions with endowments of at least $9 billion that also operate a state contract college.
